attributes.review: The app to weeks to download ! When it did finally finish it emitted a sound that made the neighborhood cats IMPLODE. The cats still managed to survive and proceed to roam the streets groaning, every night since then I have to ward some off with a broom. I can’t remember the last time I slept peacefully. At one point the cats banned together and started a clan. They patrol the streets and made a sacrifice out of a visiting priest. Also this app is PROPAGANDA being spread by a racist , fascist! 😉
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app, it gave me a virus on my phone and deleted all photos and videos from my camera roll. I don’t know how it happened but I do not recommend downloading this app unless you want your phone number leaked. My phone number keeps getting random calls and it’s getting annoying so please do not get the app because you will regret it.
attributes.title: Virus and Phone Number Leaked

attributes.review: overall, a horrendous app. it took super long to download, then it took up so much space on my phone, it actually imploded! when i finally got a new blank phone and was able to download this godforsaken app, i saw how terrible it was inside too. the format was disgusting and super confusing. even worse than facebook! if i could give this app a zero star rating i would.
attributes.title: Horrible Orange Man’s Horrible App

attributes.review: my favorite animal are giraffes. 🦒i ordered a box of shirts from this app and what was inside you may ask. 🤔A CHOPPED UP CAT! 😡ugh what a bummer.🤠so then i went to a trump rally and i asked one of the security officers 👮‍♀️ where to put my chopped up cat and he said he didn’t know.🤬also my favorite color of glowstick is blue.😈 do you know why?🤔because they are white then when you crack it it turns blue.😯it’s so satisfying!🤗
attributes.title: my sheep’s on minecraft do not approve 🎃

attributes.review:

It was Trumps birth certificate......that states he is in fact the reincarnation of hitler and was born in Germany😓😓. How could you let this slip under the rug I was a huge fan of trump before this🤬. But now I find out that he isn’t even American🇱🇷. How can America strive if his whole presidency is built on lies😖😭? Do better president trump your country is watching😟👀.

Sincerely, A Confused Conservative💋❤️

In conclusion I believe Apple should delete this app because it’s a bad app and takes forever to use
